revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 78:;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 32 obols 13.;(Pauni) 21 likewise:;Harpagathes, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 12 obols 28;;Sempronia Longinia through the agency of Julius Maximus (Maximion);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 43 obols 5.5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 6 obol 1.5, naubion drachmas 4 obols 2.5, surcharges drachmas 10 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 216 obols 27) eparourion drachmas 29 obols 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 2.5, kollybos drachma 1 obols 4, in total drachmas 98 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 109 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 6 obols 5.5, in total drachmas 116 obols 4 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 drachmas 2 obols 3.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 232 obols 26.;Epeiph 5:;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, copper drachma 1 obols 28;;Anchorymphis, son of Petheus;;(in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 14) camel tax of year 13 drachmas 20, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5, in total drachmas 21 obol 1.5;;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, copper drachmas 4;;Tamarres, daughter of Apynchis (Tamaron);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira obols 5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 10) eparourion obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obol 1.5;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, copper drachma 1 obols 28;;Karanos, fatherless, mother Prodous, undertaker, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;Papeis, fatherless, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 8;;Leonides, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taorsenouphis, copper drachma 1 (that of the priests) drachmas 4;;Valerios, fatherless, mother Valeria, obols 28;;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 76 obols 20.;(Epeiph) 6 likewise:;Patron, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, copper drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, copper drachmas 4 (that of the priests) drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Heron, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
